briefTitle: Intervention to Hepatic and Pulmonary Metastasis in Breast Cancer Patients
officialTitle: Intervention to Hepatic and Pulmonary Metastasis in Breast Cancer Patients: Prospective, Observational, Multi-institutional Registration Study - IMET
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

Metastatic breast cancer (lung and/or hepatic metastasis) 18 years and older Antineoplastic treatment

Exclusion Criteria:

No lung and/or hepatic metastasis Below 18 years No antineoplastic treatment
